mapper.insert: insert into menu (menu_number, menu_name, menu_price, menu_file, menu_category, menu_option, member_number) values (#{menuNumber}, #{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{menuFile}, #{menuCategory}, #{menuOption}, #{memberNumber})
mapper.update: update member set menu_name = #{menuName}, menu_price = #{menuPrice}, menu_file=#{menuFile}, menu_category = #{menuCategory}, menu_option = #{menuOption} where member_number = #{memberNumber}
